document_data.mainbody:
rodinn Deepstone was a dwarven blacksmith for hire from the city of Neverwinter, active in the late 15 century DR.
Trodinn Deepstone spent the entirety of his long life with a hammer in hand, ablaze by the heat of blacksmithing furnaces. Despite that, Trodinn had never grew tired of such labor. He was truly happy working the metal into quality weapons. By the late 15 century DR, Trodinn was working in the city of Neverwinter, offering his services to adventurers and city defenders.
